title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server to pull, run, and manage LLMs locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in Modelfile system.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, file uploads, and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to integrate local Ollama models into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Lightning-fast CLI tool that bundles optimized llama.cpp backends for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Collection of VS Code and JetBrains plugins that use Ollama models for inline code completion and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js-based chat UI that connects to Ollama via REST API and stores conversations in localStorage.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake and package definition for reproducible Ollama installations on NixOS.

title: ollama-gui-elctron
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Electron and React.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI pipelines to run LLM-based tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed APIs and async Tokio client for Ollama.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support and minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models to summarize notes, generate ideas, and answer questions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels with slash commands and moderation.
